The founder of Left Action: John Hlinko, admitted that the meme contained a fake quote from Thomas Jefferson, indicating that the quote attributed to Jefferson is not genuine.
The Thomas Jefferson Encyclopedia: maintained by the Thomas Jefferson Foundation, states that the alleged quote from Jefferson has not been found in his writings and is considered a spurious quotation.
